name: Uncle Heff
description: Have you ever wanted to try yourself as a director, but not just a director, but a director of erotic films. Uncle Heff will give you the opportunity to try yourself, in our game, you will be able to upgrade your communication skills with the fair sex in order to persuade them to star in your dirty video, you will also have to learn how to earn money by selling your masterpieces on various platforms. Uncle Heff is a mix of economic strategy and dating sim. In the game, you will have the opportunity to meet and persuade to take part in your development from 4 charming girls, each has its own character and each needs its own approach. Oh yes, do not forget that the police are on the alert, and will try their best to stop you. Also in our game there are a couple of surprises that you will find out for yourself.
